production.description: Enables the production output-mode for your bundled files.

watch.description: Enables the watcher for your files.

entry.description: Defines the build entry for the addon.

output.description: Defines the output folder for the bundled file. eg `./builds/UserDetails.plugin.js`

filename.description: Defines the output filename for the bundled file.

debug.description: Enables debug mode, so a file in `logs/06.29.21.log`
